original_text: And most of the brothers, having become confident in the Lord by my imprisonment, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
korean_text: 형제 중 다수가 나의 매임으로 말미암아 주 안에서 신뢰함으로 겁 없이 하나님의 말씀을 더욱 담대히 전하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: having become confident in the Lord by my imprisonment
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 투옥으로 말미암아 주 안에서 담대해져서

sentences.original_text: are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
